items.title: Why Scott Bessent wants to make it easier for banks to own Treasurys
items.description: US regulators are close to easing a key requirement for banks that the Trump administration hopes will inject more liquidity into the Treasury market. The move would mark a retreat from a rule made following the 2008 financial crisis.
